# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. Considering its value, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $180. This special offer includes a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, ensuring you have ample time to enjoy its benefits. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your life with our top-tier product. Let me know if you're interested in securing it at this exceptional price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer
